98  virtual Eigen::VectorXd computeSurfaceReactionRatesPerReaction(){
99  throw LogicError()
100  << "computeSurfaceReactionRatesPerReaction can be called only "
101  << "when surface reactions can occur!";
102  }
103

111  throw LogicError()

114  }

129  {
130  throw LogicError()

132  << "the the diffusion flux to the surface are needed!";
133  }
134
